channel.title: [508 Please Help]!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im getting pretty annoyed. Im trying to run a 508 server but almost every link I find on here are expired or not working. I finally find a working server but no client. I use an ip changing client and it crashed and gave me an error: [code]Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1: 156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true [/code]
Does anyone have an actually working 508 or something with a valid link or anyone know how to fix this error? I just want to get to hosting :/...

item.title: [508 Please Help]!

item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Hey guys, im getting pretty annoyed. Im trying to run a 508 server but almost every link I find on here are expired or not working. I finally find a working server but no client. I use an ip changing client and it crashed and gave me an error:

Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1: 156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true

Does anyone have an actually working 508 or something with a valid link or anyone know how to fix this error? I just want to get to hosting :/…
